drawnet.lib.solvers
Class Solver

java.lang.Object
  drawnet.lib.solvers.Solver
Direct Known Subclasses:
SolverLauncher
public abstract class Solver
extends java.lang.Object

This is the root class for solvers and provide a basic common interface. A SolverListener can be assigned to it: when the status of the solver changes, the notifyEvent() method of the listener is called, so the solver's client application can be notified.

See Also:
SolverListener, SolverLauncher

Solves a model.

Parameters:
